GSD.description:
md-raid10: fix KASAN warning

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.211 by commit ce839b9331c11780470f3d727b6fe3c2794a4620. For more details please see the references link.
